title: Forget chips: The next battleground in the U.S.-China AI race is nuclear power
summary: The race for AI supremacy is quickly becoming a race for energy supremacy. lags China in nuclear development, both the government and Big Tech are making a massive new push to close the gap.

title: Is it true than I need one more Social Security credit to receive benefits? If so, I’ll have to go back to work.
summary: “I was told that I would not receive monthly Social Security payments because I don’t have 40 credits.”

title: Why the bull market for stocks may now hinge on the 10-year Treasury yield
summary: With stocks at record highs, Ron Albahary Albahary at Laird Norton has been leaning into ways to hedge volatility while “hedging is cheap.”

title: My in-laws, 95, are leaving us $250K. What’s the smart way to invest this money?
summary: “They have a low income and do not file taxes.”

title: My fiancée and I are 61. I’m moving into her home. How do we divide the expenses fairly?
summary: “Once I have moved in with her, the plan is to rent out my house.”
